entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Severn
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -24.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Severn Airport 2:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy

Pressure: 100.9 kPa

Humidity: 77 %

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 50 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
